sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts'; import { Globe, TrendingUp, AlertTriangle, Users } from 'lucide-react'; // Mock data based on the dashboard design const mockDashboardData = { metrics: { totalAddresses: { value: 12847, change: '+2.1%', trend: 'up' }, highRisk: { value: 1234, change: '+12.3%', trend: 'up' }, activeInvestigations: { value: 89, change: '+5.7%', trend: 'up' }, volumeTracked: { value: 2400000, formatted: '$2.4M', change: '+18.2%', trend: 'up' } }, globalThreatDistribution: [ { country: 'Russia', addresses: 234, riskLevel: 'high' }, { country: 'North Korea', addresses: 156, riskLevel: 'critical' }, { country: 'China', addresses: 89, riskLevel: 'medium' }, { country: 'Iran', addresses: 67, riskLevel: 'high' }, { country: 'Unknown', addresses: 445, riskLevel: 'critical' } ], riskCategories: [ { category: 'Money Laundering', count: 450 }, { category: 'Drug Trafficking', count: 230 }, { category: 'Terrorism', count: 120 }, { category: 'Fraud', count: 580 }, { category: 'Ransomware', count: 150 } ], recentAddresses: [ { address: '1A1zP1eP5QGefi2DMPTfTL5SLmv7DivfNa', cryptoType: 'bitcoin', status: 'active', riskLevel: 'MEDIUM' } ] }; const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { const [dashboardData] = useState(mockDashboardData); const riskLevelColors = { critical: '#ef4444', high: '#f59e0b', medium: '#3b82f6', low: '#10b981' }; const chartData = dashboardData.riskCategories.map(item => ({ name: item.category.replace(' ', '\n'), value: item.count })); return (
{/* Metrics Cards */}
{/* Total Addresses */}

Total Addresses

{dashboardData.metrics.totalAddresses.value.toLocaleString()}

{dashboardData.metrics.totalAddresses.change} from last month

{/* High Risk */}

High Risk

{dashboardData.metrics.highRisk.value.toLocaleString()}

{dashboardData.metrics.highRisk.change} from last month

{/* Active Investigations */}

Active Investigations

{dashboardData.metrics.activeInvestigations.value}

{dashboardData.metrics.activeInvestigations.change} from last month

{/* Volume Tracked */}

Volume Tracked

{dashboardData.metrics.volumeTracked.formatted}

{dashboardData.metrics.volumeTracked.change} from last month

{/* Global Threat Distribution */}

Global Threat Distribution

{dashboardData.globalThreatDistribution.map((item, index) => { return (
{item.country}
{item.addresses} addresses
{item.riskLevel}
); })}

Risk Categories

); }; export default Dashboard;
